title: How to Play Gameboy Advance Games on an iOS Device with GBA4iOS

steps.headline: Go to your iOS device and launch Safari and go to gba4iosapp.com.
Click to the Download tab at the top of the webpage.
steps.description: It should now navigate you to a page with the latest version of GBA4iOS, and the version of GBA4iOS for the previous OS. In this case, the latest version is 2.0 and the previous version is 1.6.2. 1.6.2 is designed for iOS 6 and 2.0 is designed for iOS 7

steps.headline: If you are using iOS 7, click download for the latest version which in this case is 2.0
For iOS 6 users, click download for 1.6.2.
After you started the download, for either versions, go to your Settings, General, Date & Time, Unselect "Set Automatically" and set your date to February 18th 2014 or before that time.
steps.description: Be noted that you need to do this after you start the download.

steps.headline: Once the download is finished, open the app.
steps.description: It should bring you to a list that looks somewhat like this (except for the fact that the list will be empty for you).

steps.headline: Click the plus sign and it will take you to the CoolROMs website in the app where you can download GBA games.
Once you find a GBA game you like, click the name of the GBA game you want.
steps.description: This will link you to it's download page. Scroll down and you will find "Download Now". Click on it and it will start to download.

steps.headline: Once it's downloaded, you can start playing GBA games!

text: Go to your iOS device and launch Safari and go to gba4iosapp.com. Other browsers will not work. Click to the Download tab at the top of the webpage. It should now navigate you to a page with the latest version of GBA4iOS, and the version of GBA4iOS for the previous OS. In this case, the latest version is 2.0 and the previous version is 1.6.2. 1.6.2 is designed for iOS 6 and 2.0 is designed for iOS 7 If you are using iOS 7, click download for the latest version which in this case is 2.0  For iOS 6 users, click download for 1.6.2.  After you started the download, for either versions, go to your Settings, General, Date & Time, Unselect "Set Automatically" and set your date to February 18th 2014 or before that time. Be noted that you need to do this after you start the download. Once the download is finished, open the app. It should bring you to a list that looks somewhat like this (except for the fact that the list will be empty for you). Click the plus sign and it will take you to the CoolROMs website in the app where you can download GBA games.  Once you find a GBA game you like, click the name of the GBA game you want. This will link you to it's download page. Scroll down and you will find "Download Now". Click on it and it will start to download. Once it's downloaded, you can start playing GBA games!
